overview: When Kris tells Sam Weatherfield, the inventor, about breaking his parent’s window and running away, Sam has Kris play a strange, colorful game called HOOMANIA.  As Kris places his piece on the board, he is zapped INSIDE the game, full of life-sized animated characters like the daffy Dodo Bird or the goodie-gobbling sluggards.  These crazy creatures, and others, either help or hinder Kris in his race to Mount Wisdom.  Through his fantastic adventure, Kris learns the true meaning of “wisdom”.
tagline: A journey into Proverbs with surprises around every bend.
title: Hoomania
